normal_class.comment: Newer versions of Javascript permit class but are prototypes (an alternative approach to the object concept) which is the core concept of Javascript.
normal_class.name: Normal class

packages.comment: A package manager like NPM (https://www.npmjs.com/) or Deno (https://deno.land/) can be used to create and manage Javascript packages.
packages.name: Packages

extends_class.name: Class that inherits/extends another class
